string-array.name: string_array_first_row
string-array.item: This application allows users to ask and chat with an AI Model based on GPT 4.0 on Game Related Questions. The AI model also helps with you gaming experiencein troubleshooting your ingame experience.

string-array.name: string_array_second_row
string-array.item: The API key used in this application is purchased to utilize the apps full AI capabilities

string-array.name: string_array_third_row
string-array.item: This application serves as a bridge between the user and the OpenAI Game Assistant which runs the backend of our system. Whenever a user sends a message to the AI, the message is forwarded to OpenAI to generate a response. However, the prompts are customized to work only to answer game related questions which is either academic or performance interactive games.

string-array.name: string_array_fourth_row
string-array.item: You can no longer use this application because an API key is required and also to help you answer gamerelated quesions to connect with the OpenAI. Therefore, it is advisable to utilize your own API key for uninterrupted use of the application.

string-array.name: string_array_fifth_row
string-array.item: OpenAI provides a free credit worth 1200 pesos for a period of three months. Beyond that, users are required to pay for API usage. For more details, please visit\n\nhttps://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys.

string-array.name: string_array_sixth_row
string-array.item: We do not collect any personal information or data from our users, including conversations with the AI bot. It is important to note that we prioritize user privacy and security and do not gather any sensitive or personal information through our app.
